name: Shield Bash
description:
strikes with a shield attack that hits for 50 - 67 + 58% Crushing Weapon Damage, leaving your target Dazed and removing two Dodge. Shield Bash has a 100% Critical Strike for 94 - 128 if used again within five seconds.

This attack is enabled after performing three consecutive basic attacks or when you fill your Block Meter.

This attack can be instantly Flash-Cast.
